channel.title: In need of MAJOR HELP!
channel.description:
Sorry if this Topic is against the rules....
Well, I am an admin of 00berscape and want to know the port of it because i think i changed my port..... Or if anyone knows of a server status page that actually works? Or....Can someone tell me how to create my own server without downloading bunch of useless junk or without giving me any virusus?

item.title: In need of MAJOR HELP!
item.dc:creator: @ownage2 ownage?
item.description:
@ownage2 wrote:

start menu -> control panel -> system -> advanced -> enviromental variables

Ok now find the variable called “path” in the list in that new screen open. Rename it to “PATH” and then for it’s variable value (erase old one):
C:Windows\System32;“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin”

You will also need to set a variables called “classpath”. Make a new variable and give it the name classpath. No add this in for it’s value:
“C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin”

Read full topic
